The Mustaqel Visas, spearheaded by Qatar: The Mustaqel Visas, spearheaded by Qatar Manpower Solutions Co. (Jusour), stands as a groundbreaking initiative in Qatar's dynamic landscape. Designed to invigorate the nation's labor market, this Visas offers a strategic 5-year residency permit, welcoming a diverse array of global entrepreneurs, extraordinary talents, and skilled professionals...
Who can apply for a Mustaqel Visa?: Who can apply for a Mustaqel Visa?
All entrepreneurs and outstanding talent: All entrepreneurs and outstanding talent from around the world are eligible to apply for the Mustaqel Visa.
If you are a Talent, you need first to e: If you are a Talent, you need first to endorse yourself from an approved entity in Qatar
Once approved, a unique endorsement code: Once approved, a unique endorsement code will be generated,
and you will use it in your application.
If you are an entrepreneur, you need fir: If you are an entrepreneur, you need first to get an endorsement from a Qatar-Based business incubator,
Once approved, a unique endorsement code: Once approved, a unique endorsement code will be generated, and you will use it in your application.
Complete the online application form and: Complete the online application form and upload the necessary documents.
You can submit your application by follo: You can submit your application by following below steps:
Select apply for the Mustaqel Visa: Select apply for the Mustaqel Visa
Register on Jusour website and activate: Register on Jusour website and activate your account.
Provide the required information and upl: Provide the required information and upload necessary documents.
When you complete your Mustaqel Visa app: When you complete your Mustaqel Visa application, make sure that the information you provide fully matches with the information in your passport, otherwise your Mustaqel Visa will be invalid. Once you submit your Mustaqel Visa application, the information you have provided cannot be changed.
During your application, you will be req: "During your application, you will be required to select the country of origin as per the passport that you hold. If you have dual nationality, you must select the nationality of the passport that you are applying under and will use for your travel to Qatar.
The passport that you use for the applic: The passport that you use for the application must be the same as the one you will use while travelling to Qatar. If different, then your Mustaqel Visa will be invalid.
Your passport should be valid for at lea: Your passport should be valid for at least 6 months from your date of your arrival to Qatar. If your passport is valid for less than 6 months, you will be unable to board your flight and enter Qatar.
Your passport should have at least 1 bla: Your passport should have at least 1 blank page in order for your Mustaqel Visa to be stamped in your passport upon entry into the State of Qatar.
The Mustaqel Visa is valid for the appli: The Mustaqel Visa is valid for the applicant only.
After completing your Mustaqel Visa appl: After completing your Mustaqel Visa application and providing the requested documents, you will have to make the administrative cost payment through the payment gateway. You can pay the Administrative Cost using the “online payment” which is enabled to make international transactions.
Download the Mustaqel Visa administrativ: Download the Mustaqel Visa administrative cost receipt.
Following the successful payment of the: Following the successful payment of the administrative costs and your application is fully submitted for processing, you will receive a receipt with the payment details. We recommend that you retain a copy of your receipt for reference.
The administrative cost payment is the l: The administrative cost payment is the last step of your application process after submitting your details and the other mandatory documents. The administrative cost to be paid is as below:
If your Mustaqel Visa application is rej: If your Mustaqel Visa application is rejected, a refund will be processed on the same card used for payment. The refund excludes the administrative costs and bank processing fee.
After you pay the Mustaqel Visa administ: After you pay the Mustaqel Visa administrative cost, you will receive an email with the payment confirmation.
The Mustaqel Visa administrative cost wi: The Mustaqel Visa administrative cost will be paid in Qatari Riyal, and the equivalent amount in your local currency will be deducted from your bank account.
Let our Help Desk team know if you face: Let our Help Desk team know if you face any suspended or unsuccessful transactions during the application procedure. Please do not create a new application or make a new payment unless you have been advised to do so by the Help Desk team.
An official governmental document certif: An official governmental document certifying holders' identity and citizenship, passport must be valid for at least 6 months ahead. Additionally, a high-resolution passport picture must be provided to ensure accuracy and clarity.
Job contract or No Objection Certificate: Job contract or No Objection Certificate
Sponsor’s Qatar ID or Company Establishm: Sponsor’s Qatar ID or Company Establishment Card
Languages test proof (Arabic or English): Languages test proof (Arabic or English) - optional
Contract signed with hiring entity or of: Contract signed with hiring entity or offer letter from hiring entity
Upon your arrival to Qatar please ensure: Upon your arrival in Qatar, please make sure to carry the following documents and present them to the Immigration officer for visa stamping:
A valid passport with at least 6 months: A valid passport with a minimum validity of 6 months from the entry travel date to Qatar.
A copy of your printed Independent visa.
The Immigration officer might request ot: The Immigration officer may request additional information/documents, such as proof of accommodation.
On arriving at any port of entry into th: Upon arriving at any entry port in the State of Qatar, please follow these steps:
Follow the correct visa lane as advised: Follow the designated visa lane as advised by the immigration officers.
Present to the immigration officer your: Present your valid passport and a copy of your printed Independent Visa to the immigration officer.
Get your Mustaqel visa stamped in your p: Have your Independent visa stamped in your passport.

If the applicant is under a company spon: If the applicant is under a company sponsorship, the company’s valid establishment card should be provided.

After receiving your Mustaqel Visa, Juso: After receiving your Mustaqel Visa, Jusour is providing a guide and exclusive offers for your settlement in the state of Qatar.
Our PRO is your guide to Qatar, there se: Our PRO is your guide to Qatar, their services shall provide you guidance on all aspects during your settlement in Qatar as well as any inquiries about rules and regulations in Qatar. You may contact them on their 24-hour line for information.
Mustaqel Visa holders are eligible for a: Mustaqel Visa holders are eligible for a free sim card with minutes and data upon arriving in Qatar from any local providers.

Mustaqel Visa holders are eligible for a: Mustaqel Visa holders are eligible for accommodation at exclusive rates provided by Jusour. To book your stay prior to arrival, kindly view the

After arriving in Qatar if you would lik: After arriving in Qatar if you would like to explore the country, our partners provide exclusive packages with a tour guide to show you around Qatar.
If you are an individual talented within: If you are an individual talented within the below sectors and endorsed by an entity in Qatar, then you are eligible for Mustaqel Visa, but you should have either a job offer from an entity inside Qatar or financial means for 3 months’ worth 36,500 Qatari riyals or more :
If you are an entrepreneur having an app: If you are an entrepreneur having an approval from any of the below Business Incubators and the project value is 250,000 Qatari riyals or more, then you are eligible for Mustaqel Visa :
Mustaqel Visa holders is eligible for a: Mustaqel Visa holders is eligible for a free sim card with minutes and data while arriving in Qatar from both providers.
Qatar Manpower Solutions Co. (Jusour) Q.P.S.C (“Jusour”) is committed to protecting the rights and privacy of the visitors of its website.
The words we”, us or our(s) hereunder re: The words we”, us or our(s) hereunder refer to Jusour and the terms you and your hereunder refer to the user of Jusour website.
You consent to the collection, use and d: You consent to the collection, use and disclosure of the Information (as defined below) as set forth in this privacy policy or any modification thereof by providing Information using any of the services provided by Jusour. Therefore, please review this privacy policy carefully.
By consenting, a legal binding agreement: By consenting, a legal binding agreement between yourself and Jusour and between any party you’re representing and Jusour will be constituted regarding the privacy policy.
This privacy policy describes how Jusour: This privacy policy describes how Jusour collects and uses the Information you provide on your behalf or on behalf of a third party. It also describes the choices available to you regarding our use of the Information and how you can access and update this Information. Please read the following carefully to understand our views and practices regarding the Information and how we will treat it.
In the event of any inconsistency or con: In the event of any inconsistency or conflict between the website terms and this privacy policy, the terms of this privacy policy shall prevail.
“Information” means information related: “Information” means information related to the user of the Jusour website or information related to a third party that the user submits as part of the use of the Jusour website.
The Information we collect relates to in: The Information we collect relates to information you give us by filling in forms on Jusour website, or by corresponding with us (for example, by e-mail). The submitted information includes but is not limited to information you provide when you register to use the website, subscribe to any of our services, search for Jusour or services, and when you report a problem with Jusour or our services.
We may collect certain technical and dev: We may collect certain technical and device information about your use of our website/mobile application. Such information may include your internet protocol address, information about your device, browser and operating system, and the date and time of your visit/use of our website/mobile application.
Furthermore, you may otherwise interact: Furthermore, you may otherwise interact with us, whether in person, by phone, by email, or otherwise, we may collect Information that you provide to us during these interactions. This Information may include your name, e-mail address and other contact information.
We use the Information for the purposes: We use the Information for the purposes you consent for, and for such other purposes as may be permitted or required by applicable law.
We do not use the Information we collect: We do not use the Information we collect to provide advertising of third-party services or to conduct targeted advertising of our services across third party websites or service offerings. We will only disclose the Information for purposes relating to the services we provide through our website/mobile application.
We will share the Information with third: We will share the Information with third parties only in the ways that are described in this privacy policy.
We may provide the Information to compan: We may provide the Information to companies that provide services to help us with our business activities. These third parties are authorized to use the Information only as necessary to provide these services to us.
We will use, disclose or retain the Info: We will use, disclose or retain the Information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which that Information was collected and as permitted or required by law, or until your account is deleted - whichever comes first.
You may make a written request to us to: You may make a written request to us to delete your account. Unless required by applicable law or regulation to retain the Information, we will make reasonable efforts to delete your account and Information promptly after receiving a request from you to do so.
This privacy policy applies only to our: This privacy policy applies only to our website and services. This privacy policy does not extend to any websites or services provided by third parties. We do not assume responsibility for the privacy practices of such third parties, and we encourage you to review all third-party privacy policies prior to using third party websites or products or services.
We may update this privacy policy to ref: We may update this privacy policy to reflect changes to our information practices or any relevant statute, regulations and/or policy. We encourage you to periodically review our website/mobile application for the latest information on our privacy practices.
Qatar Manpower Solutions Co. (Jusour) Q.P.S.C (“Jusour”) provides an online portal as part of the Mustaqel initiative (“Endorsement Portal”) that allows:
Those who wish to apply for a Mustaqel v: Those who wish to apply for a Mustaqel visa applicants from the talent category to apply for an endorsement from designated public entities in the State of Qatar; and
Accredited business incubators in Qatar: Accredited business incubators in Qatar to request endorsement for their accredited entrepreneurs.
Jusour is a data controller and is, in a: Jusour is a data controller and is, in accordance with the terms below, responsible for the processing of your Personal Data (as defined below).
Personal data refers to any information: Personal data refers to any information that may be linked directly or indirectly to your application for an endorsement of your talent (Application) by a public entity in the State of Qatar (the Public Entity) including your full name, email address, occupation, gender, passport number, type of passport, passport expiry date, passport place of issue, date of birth, place of birth, nationality, permanent address in the country of origin, PO box, marital status, address in the state of Qatar if any, mobile number, Qatar residency status if any, QID number if you are a Qatar resident, QID copy if you are a Qatar resident, information related to language proficiency in English and Arabic, passport copy, CV, educational degree(s) copy, support documents to prove your talent and any other documents requested by the relevant public entity in the State of Qatar from which you request the endorsement (together, the Personal Data).
By submitting your Personal Data, you he: By submitting your Personal Data, you hereby:
agree to the processing of your Personal: agree to the processing of your Personal Data as set out in this Privacy Policy;
confirm that the Personal Data you have: confirm that the Personal Data you have submitted to Jusour is correct;
acknowledge that the processing of Perso: acknowledge that the processing of Personal Data is necessary to process your request of an endorsement of your talent;
understand that the failure to provide a: understand that the failure to provide any or all of the Personal Data requested by Jusour or the Public Entity may lead to the rejection of your Application for an endorsement; and
confirm that you have read, understood a: confirm that you have read, understood and agree to be bound by the terms of this Privacy Policy.
Jusour will collect and use the Personal: Jusour will collect and use the Personal Data for the purposes of:
processing the Application for an endors: processing the Application for an endorsement;
communicating with you in relation to yo: communicating with you in relation to your Application; and
any other reason deemed necessary by Jus: any other reason deemed necessary by Jusour for the purposes of your Application.
To the extent permitted under the laws o: To the extent permitted under the laws of the State of Qatar and other applicable data protections laws, Jusour, its affiliates and relevant authorities in the State of Qatar may use the Personal Data for the purposes set out above, at any time without any further written consent from you.
In using the Personal Data, Jusour will: In using the Personal Data, Jusour will comply with its obligations and safeguard your rights under Qatari laws with respect to any Personal Data to which Jusour is subject, including:
the right to be informed about the colle: the right to be informed about the collection and use of the Personal Data;
the right to access and to receive a cop: the right to access and to receive a copy of the Personal Data that Jusour holds about you;
the right to rectification if any Person: the right to rectification if any Personal Data that Jusour holds about you is inaccurate or incomplete;
the right to erasure – i.e., the right t: the right to erasure – i.e., the right to ask Jusour to delete any Personal Data that Jusour holds about you;
the right to restrict (i.e., prevent) th: the right to restrict (i.e., prevent) the processing of the Personal Data; and
the right to revoke consent at any time.
Storage of the Personal Data, transfer t: Storage of the Personal Data, transfer to third parties and retention
Jusour shall store, process and retain t: Jusour shall store, process and retain the Personal Data as follows:
the Personal Data will be stored and mai: the Personal Data will be stored and maintained in a database in Qatar. If Jusour stores, processes or transfers Personal Data to any other country, Jusour will take all reasonable steps to ensure that the Personal Data is treated as safely and securely as it would be within the European Economic Area and under the applicable data protection laws.
the Personal Data may be transferred to: the Personal Data may be transferred to third parties in and outside of the State of Qatar including (without limitation) to:
IT service providers, for processing on: IT service providers, for processing on behalf of Jusour;
the relevant Public Entities in Qatar wh: the relevant Public Entities in Qatar who will issue the endorsement of the Applicants in the talent category; and
the relevant government authorities in t: the relevant government authorities in the State of Qatar who need to access the Personal Data for any purpose related to an Application.
unless otherwise required to comply with: unless otherwise required to comply with applicable laws or for the protection of Jusour’s rights, the Personal Data shall be retained by Jusour only for as long as is necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined above.
By submitting your Personal Data, you he: By submitting your Personal Data, you herewith unconditionally and irrevocably waive any and all claims against Jusour, its officers, directors, employees, representatives, affiliates, auxiliaries and partners resulting from any loss incurred in connection with the use of the Personal Data by Jusour at set out in this Privacy Policy.
Jusour shall have the right to make any: Jusour shall have the right to make any amendments it deems appropriate and reasonable to this privacy policy at any time and without prior notice.
This privacy policy is subject to and sh: This privacy policy is subject to and shall be interpreted in accordance with the provisions of the laws, procedures, rules and regulations applicable in the State of Qatar, and the Qatari courts of justice shall be the only courts competent to consider any dispute that may arise from the implementation or interpretation of any provision of this privacy policy.
In the event of any cause for complaint: In the event of any cause for complaint about the use of the Personal Data or if you have any questions relating to this Privacy Policy, please contact Jusour at the following email address:
. All notices may also be addressed to Q: . All notices may also be addressed to Qatar Manpower Solutions Co. (Jusour) Q.P.S.C., Qatar Tower, 15th Floor, Petra St, PO Box 8949, Doha, State of Qatar, Attention: Legal Department.

Personal data of the Entrepreneur refers: Personal data of the Entrepreneur refers to any information that may be linked directly or indirectly to the Entrepreneur’s application for the approval of his business plan by a Business Incubator in Qatar including the full name of the Entrepreneur, email address, occupation, gender, passport number, type of passport, passport expiry date, passport place of issue, date of birth, place of birth, nationality, permanent address in the country of origin, PO box, marital status, address in the state of Qatar if any, mobile number, Qatar residency status if any, QID number if the Entrepreneur is a Qatar resident, QID copy if the Entrepreneur is a Qatar resident, information related to language proficiency in English and Arabic of the Entrepreneur, passport copy, CV, educational degree(s) copy, support documents in relation to the business plan of the Entrepreneur, sector of business and name of the project (together, the Personal Data).

the Personal Data that was submitted to: the Personal Data that was submitted to Jusour is correct;
the Business Incubator and the Entrepren: the Business Incubator and the Entrepreneur acknowledge that the processing of Personal Data is necessary to issue the endorsement;

the Business Incubator and the Entrepreneur understand that the failure to provide any or all of the Personal Data requested by Jusour may lead to not issuing the endorsement certificate with the relevant code to apply for a Mustaqel visa; and
the representative of the Business Incub: the representative of the Business Incubator has read, understood and he/she and the Business Incubator agrees to be bound by the terms of this Privacy Policy.
By using the account established by Juso: By using the account established by Jusour for the Business Incubator, the Business Incubator hereby confirms that:
it will use and process the Personal Dat: it will use and process the Personal Data of the Entrepreneur only as strictly necessary for the purposes of the Endorsement portal and the Mustaqel program in accordance with the terms of this Privacy Policy and in accordance with applicable laws in the State of Qatar.
Jusour will collect and use the Personal: Jusour will collect and use the Personal Data of the Entrepreneur for the purposes of:
processing the endorsement certificate w: processing the endorsement certificate with a code that can be used by the Entrepreneur to apply for a Mustaqel visa;
communicating with you, the Business Inc: communicating with you, the Business Incubator or the Entrepreneur in relation to the endorsement certificate request; and
any other reason deemed necessary by Jus: any other reason deemed necessary by Jusour for the purposes of the endorsement certificate request of the Entrepreneur.
To the extent permitted under the laws o: To the extent permitted under the laws of the State of Qatar and other applicable data protections laws, Jusour, its affiliates and relevant authorities in the State of Qatar may use the Personal Data for the purposes set out above, at any time without any further written consent from you, the Business Incubator or the Entrepreneur.
In using the Personal Data, Jusour will: In using the Personal Data, Jusour will comply with its obligations and safeguard the rights of the Entrepreneur under Qatari laws with respect to any Personal Data to which Jusour is subject, including:
the right to access and to receive a cop: the right to access and to receive a copy of the Personal Data that Jusour holds about the Entrepreneur;
the right to rectification if any Person: the right to rectification if any Personal Data that Jusour holds about the Entrepreneur is inaccurate or incomplete;
the right to erasure – i.e., the right t: the right to erasure – i.e., the right to ask Jusour to delete any Personal Data that Jusour holds about the Entrepreneur;
Jusour shall store, process and retain t: Jusour shall store, process and retain the Personal Data of the Entrepreneur as follows:
IT service providers, for processing on: IT service providers, for processing on behalf of Jusour;  and
the relevant public authorities in the S: the relevant public authorities in the State of Qatar who need to access the Personal Data for any purpose related to the issuance of an endorsement certificate for the Entrepreneur.
By submitting the Personal Data of the E: By submitting the Personal Data of the Entrepreneur, you confirm that you, the Entrepreneur and the Business Incubator herewith unconditionally and irrevocably waive any and all claims against Jusour, its officers, directors, employees, representatives, affiliates, auxiliaries and partners resulting from any loss incurred in connection with the use of the Personal Data by Jusour at set out in this Privacy Policy.
Qatar Manpower Solutions Co. (Jusour) Q.P.S.C (“Jusour”) provides an online portal as part of the Mustaqel program (“Endorsement Portal”) that allows accredited business incubators in Qatar (the “Business Incubator”) to endorse Mustaqel visa applicants from the entrepreneur category (“Entrepreneur”).

Qatar Manpower Solutions Co. (Jusour) Q.P.S.C (“Jusour”) provides an online portal as part of the Mustaqel program (“Endorsement Portal”) that allows Mustaqel visa applicants from the talent category (“Applicant”) to apply for an endorsement request from designated public entities in the State of Qatar.
The Applicant must create an account tha: The Applicant must create an account that enables him to access and use the Endorsement Portal.
By creating an account, I hereby confirm: By creating an account, I hereby confirm that I am an Applicant of a Mustaqel visa in the talent category as described above and that I agree to be bound by these terms and conditions (“Terms and Conditions”).
The present Terms and Conditions constit: The present Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement between Jusour and myself (the “Agreement”).
My use of the Endorsement Portal constit: My use of the Endorsement Portal constitutes my acceptance to be bound by this Agreement, by virtue of which a contractual relationship is established between me and Jusour.
Jusour has the right to amend this Agree: Jusour has the right to amend this Agreement from time to time. These amendments will be effective when posted on the portal or when notified to me by Jusour.
Any decision I make in relation to acces: Any decision I make in relation to accessing or using the Endorsement Portal is based on my own discretion. Any information published on the portal is not intended as an advice and Jusour does not have any legal responsibility as a result of my access, use or reliance on the information.
Eligibility: I confirm and undertake tha: Eligibility: I confirm and undertake that I have the capacity to register and use the Endorsement Portal.
Profile Creation: I acknowledge that in: Profile Creation: I acknowledge that in order to access and use the Endorsement Portal to benefit from the services provided, I must register and create a personal profile on the portal that includes all my information and the documents required from me. The personal profile will be created in Arabic and English languages.
As part of my endorsement application, I: As part of my endorsement application, I agree to provide the following information including my full name, email address, occupation, gender, passport number, type of passport, passport expiry date, passport place of issue, date of birth, place of birth, nationality, permanent address in the country of origin, PO box, marital status, address in the state of Qatar if any, mobile number, Qatar residency status if any, QID number if I am a Qatar resident, QID copy if I am a Qatar resident, information related to language proficiency in English and Arabic, passport copy, CV, educational degree(s) copy, support documents to prove my  talent and any other documents requested by the relevant public entity in the State of Qatar from which I request the endorsement.
I understand that the information I prov: I understand that the information I provide in my profile will be used by Jusour to evaluate my application. I take responsibility for all activities related to my account and shall not allow others to use my account.
Endorsement Application Information: I a: Endorsement Application Information: I acknowledge and agree that the information I provide during registration, including my personal information, education background, work experience, and any other relevant details, is true, accurate, and complete. I also confirm that all the documents that I submitted on the portal are correct and accurate. In the event the documents are not accurate and correct, I shall be held liable, and Jusour shall have the right to take any measures against me, including, but not limited to:
Immediately suspend, temporary or perman: Immediately suspend, temporary or permanently, my right to use the Endorsement Portal.
Remove any material uploaded to The Endo: Remove any material uploaded to The Endorsement Portal.
Pay all costs (administrative and legal: Pay all costs (administrative and legal costs) resulting from the breach.
Based on Jusour’s sole disclosure, discl: Based on Jusour’s sole disclosure, disclose of all information to the relevant authorities
I agree, on the creation of an account o: I agree, on the creation of an account on The Endorsement Portal, to receive communications from Jusour, whether by e-mail, text messages or phone calls.
I agree to only request an endorsement f: I agree to only request an endorsement from a public entity in Qatar that is relevant for my field of talent and I agree to abide by all requirements and conditions set out by such entity for the purposes of obtaining such endorsement.
I acknowledge that my endorsement shall: I acknowledge that my endorsement shall be valid for a period of six months and that I should submit the Mustaqel visa application within a period of six months from obtaining the endorsement using the code provided to me with the endorsement letter.
I acknowledge that submitting an endorse: I acknowledge that submitting an endorsement application does not guarantee that I will obtain an endorsement and that my endorsement request may be rejected without any obligation on Jusour or the public entity in the State of Qatar to provide reasons for rejection.

Qatar Manpower Solutions Co. I also agree to deposit the required amo: I also agree to deposit the required amount as administrative costs in relation to my Mustaqel visa application. I understand that the full deposit will be processed if my Mustaqel visa application is successfful. I also understand that in case my Mustaqel visa application is not successful, only a portion of the amount deposited shall be refunded to me.

By consenting, a legal binding agreement: By consenting, a legal binding agreement between yourself and Jusour will be constituted regarding the privacy policy.
This privacy policy describes how Jusour: This privacy policy describes how Jusour collects and uses the Information you provide. It also describes the choices available to you regarding our use of the Information and how you can access and update this Information. Please read the following carefully to understand our views and practices regarding the Information and how we will treat it.
“Information” means personal information: “Information” means personal information related to the user of the Jusour website and any information you submit as part of your application and the registering process on the Jusour website. This information includes, but is not limited to, name, home address, phone number, email, information related to your field of study, information related to experience, previous work. Passport/residency number, sponsorship status in Qatar and any other information provided through the website.
The Information we collect relates to in: The Information we collect relates to information you give us by filling in forms on Jusour website, or by corresponding with us (for example, by e-mail). The submitted information includes but is not limited to information you provide when you register to use the website, subscribe to any of our services, search for Jusour or services, and when you report a problem with Jusour or our services. The Information you give us may include but not limited to your name, address, e-mail address and phone number, education history, previous work experience, age, username, password and other registration information, and personal description.
We may use the Information we collect to: We may use the Information we collect to provide advertising of third-party services or to conduct targeted advertising of our services across third party websites or service offerings. We will only disclose the Information to organizations for the purpose of employment, training or for other purposes relating to the services we provide through our website/mobile application.
Qatar Manpower Solutions Co. (Jusour) Q.P.S.C. (Jusour) is a data controller and is, in accordance with the terms below, responsible for the processing of your Personal Data (as defined below).
Personal data refers to any information: Personal data refers to any information that may be linked directly or indirectly to your application for a Mustaqel visa (Application) in the talent or entrepreneur category and that is required by Jusour for the purposes of an Application including your name, birthdate, nationality, gender, passport and QID numbers, passport and QID expiry dates, sponsor, email address, phone number, resume and all the information contained in the resume, degrees and certificates, business plan if applicable, bank certificates, and any other information or documents required for the purposes of your Application (together, the Personal Data).
acknowledge that the processing of Perso: acknowledge that the processing of Personal Data is necessary to  process your application for a Mustaqel visa;
understand that the failure to provide a: understand that the failure to provide any or all of the Personal Data requested by Jusour may lead to the rejection of your Application; and
IT service providers, for processing on: IT service providers, for processing on behalf of Jusour; and
the relevant government authorities in t: the relevant government authorities in the State of Qatar who need to access the Personal Data for any purpose related to an Application including the Ministry of Interior has the authority to issue the Mustaqel visa.
